meaning_str.bing:
n. 前夕；〈文学〉夜晚；【圣】夏娃；【名】伊芙
网络. 星战前夜；伊夫；依文

前夕；〈文学〉夜晚；【圣】夏娃；【名】伊芙

（节日等的）前夜；前夕；（重大事件发生的）前一刻；前一天；傍晚；黄昏（同evening）；（Eve）伊夫（人名）；夏娃（基督教《圣经》故事人物）

1.en: The quarrel continued until Adam fell asleep, only to be awakened by someone poking him in the chest. It was Eve.
1.cn: 争吵一直持续到亚当睡着为止。而且他会被人在胸部戮醒。这就是夏娃。

2.en: At his press conference on the eve of the game, Wenger was asked if fourth place would be out of reach if Arsenal failed to win.
2.cn: 在比赛前的新闻发布会上，温格被问及如果阿森纳没有赢得这场比赛是否意味着将退出联赛第四名的争夺。

3.en: To me, it's not just a television program; it's an event that I enjoy with my entire family on New Year's Eve.
3.cn: 对我来说，这不止是一个电视节目，这是和所有家人共度除夕的事件。

0.en: Hey. Hey. Hi Phoebe. Happy Christmas Eve Eve.

1.en: Go as my envoy to Sidao. Extend an invitation for parley on the eve of his defeat.
1.cn: 你去作为我的使者见见贾似道，在打败他的前夕邀请他和谈。

4.en: They can't cancel our play on Christmas Eve. Who does that?
4.cn: 他们不能取消我们平安夜的戏。谁决定的？

5.en: Hey guys. Janine. I just got a call to be a dancer on a television special for New Year's Eve. It's called some sort of Dick'n Rock'n Dickie Eve.
5.cn: 你们好。吉宁。我刚接到除夕特别节目的通告，叫什么狄克摇滚狄奇之夜的。

6.en: Hmm. That's too bad. We could have spent New Year's Eve waiting for the ball to drop.
6.cn: 唉，真可惜，本来可以在新年夜等着蛋蛋掉下来的。

7.en: You guys haven't gotten your presents yet? Tomorrow's Christmas Eve, what are ya gonna do?
7.cn: 你们礼物还没买好吗？明天就是圣诞夜，你们要怎么办？

8.en: It is Christmas Eve. Peppa and George are going to post their letters to Father Christmas.
8.cn: 今天是圣诞夜。佩奇和乔治要去寄信给圣诞老人。

9.en: It is Christmas Eve. Peppa and George are going to post their letters to Father Christmas.
9.cn: 今天是圣诞夜。佩奇和乔治要去寄信给圣诞老人。

10.en: Hold it. Are you talking about Dick Clark's New Year's Rocking Eve? Yeah, that's what I said.
10.cn: 慢着，是狄克克拉克新年摇滚之夜吗？就是那个。

11.en: On Christmas Eve, of all nights. You trying to wax poetic on me? I'd rather you wax that mustache.
11.cn: 而且偏偏在这平安夜。你要跟我从诗词歌赋谈到人生哲学吗？我宁可你去刮刮胡子。

12.en: Honey, it's Christmas Eve. Who even knows you're in there? No, our names are on the sign-in sheet.
12.cn: 亲爱的，今天是圣诞节前夜，谁会知道你们在那里，我们在签到表上签名。

13.en: It's massive and it's just getting geared up for the New Year's Eve celebrations. Shall we go? Yeah!
13.cn: 它的规模庞大，现在才刚刚准备开始，迎接除夕庆典。我们可以出发了？是的。

14.en: That was you? I almost died! I spent every Christmas Eve at the diner with my mom, watching her work.
14.cn: 原来是你啊？我差点被砸死了。每年圣诞前夜我都和我妈一起在餐厅度过，看她工作。

15.en: The temple might seem tranquil today, but tonight, on New Year's Eve, it is a completely different story.
15.cn: 今天这庙宇看似挺平静的，但在今晚的除夕夜里，那可完全是另一番景象了。

16.en: How about you? You just come for the food? No. Our little Kate appendectomy. Oh, no. And on Christmas Eve.
16.cn: 你呢？专门来这里买零食的吗？不是。我女儿凯特来做阑尾切除术。不是吧。还偏偏赶在平安夜。

17.en: So are you guys coming to my New Year's Eve costume party? Of course. We're coming as the Justice League of America.
17.cn: 你们几位来不来我的新年化装派对啊？当然来啊，我们要组成美国正义联盟。

18.en: But on New Year's Eve, this place is absolutely heaving. There could be as many as 100,000 people here in the evening.
18.cn: 但在除夕夜，这地方真的是人潮汹涌。除夕夜会有多达10万人来到这里。

19.en: Sorry. I'm sorry. I'm not actually Guinevere. I'm Alice Eve, and I think you got a bit confused. Maybe you saw me on stage…
19.cn: 抱歉，对不起。其实我不是圭尼维尔。我叫爱丽丝伊芙，你有一点困惑。你看见是我在舞台……
